title: Singer Chris Rea Dies at 74
summary: Chris Rea, a famous singer who made the Christmas song Driving Home for Christmas, has died at age 74. He died in a hospital after being sick for a short time, with his family around him. His family said they are very sad. Chris Rea was known for other songs too, like On the Beach and Let's Dance. Many people loved his music, and his Christmas song is used in a store's holiday ad this year. The song tells a story about someone driving home in traffic. Chris Rea wrote it in 1978, but it became popular in 1988. He joked that the song helped him go on a nice vacation. Other singers have also sung his song. He was friends with a comedian named Bob Mortimer.
